detectors.description:
Lit.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#33-42) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#35)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#36)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
Lit.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#43-53) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#45)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#46)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#47)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Lit.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#21-23)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Lit.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#27-29)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#6)
	- Lit.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#30-32)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Lit.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#43-53)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#7)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#8)
	- Lit.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#54-58)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Lit.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#33-42)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lit.sol#9)
